Title: 163: How to Deal with Disruptive Technologies
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Strategy & Innovation Consultant, Aaron Bare. You will hear why technologies like AI, blockchain, and machine learning are rapidly growing and disrupting the traditional processes of industries, know how to have the mindset to learn how to harness the use of exponential technologies and learn why companies should revisit their business models and purpose.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/163
